mapper.select: select rt_auction_name, rt_auction_down, rt_auction_unit, rt_auction_title_img, rt_auction_content, rt_auction_title_img01,rt_auction_title_img02, rt_auction_area, seller_no, rt_auction_no from rt_auction where rt_auction_no = #{rt_auction_no}

select rt.rt_tender_no, ra.rt_auction_group, ra.rt_auction_title_img, ra.rt_auction_name, ra.rt_auction_unit, rt.rt_tender_price, rt.rt_auction_no from rt_auction ra, rt_tender rt where ra.rt_auction_no = rt.rt_auction_no and rt.rt_auction_no = #{rt_auction_no}
mapper.insert: insert into rt_tender_finish( rt_tender_finish_no, rt_tender_no, recipient_name, recipient_phone, recipient_tel, recipient_address, delivery_message, pay, creditcard_name, pay_month, pay_bank, deposit_name, price, pay_date , member_id ) values ( #{rt_tender_finish_no}, #{rt_tender_no}, #{recipient_name}, #{recipient_phone}, #{recipient_tel}, #{recipient_address}, #{delivery_message}, #{pay}, #{creditcard_name}, #{pay_month}, #{pay_bank}, #{deposit_name}, #{price}, sysdate, (select member_id from rt_tender where rt_tender_no = #{rt_tender_no}) )
mapper.select: select rtf.rt_tender_finish_no, ra.rt_auction_title_img, ra.rt_auction_name, rt.rt_tender_price, rt.rt_tender_date from rt_auction ra, rt_tender rt, rt_tender_finish rtf where ra.rt_auction_no = rt.rt_auction_no and rt.rt_tender_no = rtf.rt_tender_no and member_id = #{member_id}
